common
======

[![Contributor Covenant](https://img.shields.io/badge/Contributor%20Covenant-v1.4%20adopted-ff69b4.svg)](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

This is a shared utility code between components written in Golang.

> Prerequisite

    Golang
